Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes an occupancy tax in the village of Baldwinsville
Summary: Authorizes an occupancy tax of up to 5% in the village of Baldwinsville, county of Onondaga.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing an occupancy tax in the village of Baldwinsville; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
